description: Number of reversible string structures with n beads using a maximum of four different colors.
comments: A string and its reverse are considered to be equivalent. Permuting the colors will not change the structure. Thus aabc, cbaa and bbac are all considered to be identical.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: Use de Bruijn's generalization of Polya's enumeration theorem as discussed in reference.Conjecture: a(n) = (16+(-2)^n+15*2^n+4^n)/48. G.f.: -x*(11*x^3-6*x^2-3*x+1)/((x-1)*(2*x-1)*(2*x+1)*(4*x-1)). [_Colin Barker_, Nov 24 2012]
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
